sentences: Ian Noble, IPCC Lead Author, noted that the Special Report had addressed issues of accounting, verification and reporting.
He stated that the Revised 1996 Guidelines for National Greenhouse Gas Inventories were devised for the purposes of the FCCC rather than the Protocol, and said an elaboration will be needed.
Co-Chair Thorgeirsson highlighted the importance of distinguishing between what broad decisions need to be taken by COP-6, and what issues can be dealt with at a later stage.
enb_long_title: Workshop on Land-Use, Land-Use Change and Forestry
